target: TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_A1_000_002<tab>「ドマ様式装備」の改良について
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_A1_000_003<tab>「新生古典装備」の修繕について
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_A1_000_004<tab>「蛮神風装備」の改良について
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_A1_000_006<tab>「イディルシャイア製装備」の改良について

source: TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_101_000<tab>Oh, I'm something of a traveling tinkerer, you might say.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_101_000アタシの名は、セイカ。
遍歴の職人ってヤツさ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_101_001<tab>Came through a while back, saw what the people from the House were up to, reckoned I'd be a part of it. Same with you, ain't it?
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_101_001ここに流れ着いてから、ロウェナ商会って連中に見込まれて、
武具の改良やら、修繕やらを請け負っているよ。
アンタも、どうかご贔屓にね。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_102_000<tab>Some of the Domans down in the Toll used to be successful craftsmen back in the old country. Naturally, they've a mind to preserve the old traditions. As do I.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_102_000レヴナンツトール開拓団に属する、
ドマ出身の職人たちが造った武具のことさ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_102_001<tab>Though the proper materials for the job are scarce, I should be able to track them down. I'd be more than happy to improve upon their work. Assuming you're willing to compensate me for the trouble, that is.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_102_001どれも、なかなかの名品ぞろいだけど、
アタシに言わせりゃ、まだまだ改良の余地があるね。
見合った対価さえ持ってくりゃ、仕上げてみせるよ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_103_000<tab>Lots of folk that're fond of the ancient combat arts have taken to wearing traditional equipment, right? Thing is, it's not always in the best condition. I can help with that.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_103_000各地の好事家が秘蔵していた古典的な逸品を、
ロウェナ商会が補修し、取引し始めたのが「新生古典装備」さ。
「古のジョブ」の戦技や魔法に、最適な装備だと思うね。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_103_001<tab>The materials I'll need to do so aren't cheap, though, as they're all made by the Illuminati. But something tells me you might be able to afford it...
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_103_001ただし、アタシの見立てじゃ、補修は完璧じゃない。
それなりの対価さえ支払ってもらえるんなら、
完璧に修繕して、性能を引き出してみせるよ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_104_000<tab>I presume you're familiar with the House's latest line of arms and armament? “Eikonic,” they call it. Fashioned in the image of those legendary items supposedly imbued with the essence of primals themselves, et cetera.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_104_000ロウェナ商会が「蛮神をも超える力を」って触れ込みで、
取り扱いをはじめたのが「蛮神風装備」さ。
その名の通り、蛮神を象ったナリをしていてね。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_104_001<tab>Simply put, they're reproductions. Damn fine ones, to be sure. All credit to the House's artisans. Nevertheless, for the right price, I can improve upon their work.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_104_001商会専属の腕利き職人の作だけあって、
なかなかの代物だが、アタシに言わせりゃ改善の余地がある。
対価さえもらえれば、手を加えてやるよ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_105_000<tab>See the Bangpots over yonder? That's where our community's best and brightest have come together to develop and produce the finest wares you'll find this side of the Spine.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_105_000この街に新設されたスティックキクス工房で、
人とゴブリン族の職人が協力して作った武具……
それが、イディルシャイア製装備さ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_105_001<tab>Least, that's what they'd have you believe. Me, I've got different opinions. If you're feeling generous with your coin, I can help you understand why.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2TOMESTONEWEAPONTRADEEXPLAIN_00302_SEIKA_105_001アタシも設計に参加したんだけど、
ちょっと納得のいっていない部分があってね。
対価さえもらえれば、完璧に仕上げてやるよ。
